directions: Blend cream of coconut, ice, tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez®)
3/4 cup tequila (such as Sauza® 100% Blue Agave)
1/4 cup brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)
title: Creamy Coconut Margarita
